titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to provide for Federal student loan reform.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committee on Ways and Means, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
